DOC.brief_summary: To investigate effect letrozole patient high risk ovarian hyperstimulation syndrome ( OHSS ) oocyte retrieval , incidence OHSS calculate letrozole group support treatment group .
DOC.brief_title: The Letrozole Administration During Luteal Phase
DOC.detailed_description: 1 . Object : Infertility patient frozen embryo due risk OHSS randomize allocated letrozole polygeline injection group . Inclusion criteria meet one follow condition : ( 1 ) oocyte equal 20 ; ( 2 ) human chorionic gonadotropin ( hCG ) injection serum estradiol level great equal 5000 pmol/L ; ( 3 ) day oocyte unilateral bilateral ovarian diameter great equal 10 cm ( 4 ) follicle puncture large equal number 20 . After informed consent sign , letrozole polygeline injection randomize allocate oocyte retrieval . OHSS determine accord Golan diagnosis standard . 2 . Clinical data : Including age , infertility duration , body mass index ( BMI ) , basic follicle-stimulating hormone ( FSH ) luteinizing hormone ( LH ) , antral follicle number ( AFC ) , Gn dosage , estradiol level hCG injection day , number oocyte , number embryo , early onset OHSS incidence , existence ascites . 3 . Reproductive hormone level : 1 , 4 , 7 , day take letrozole , supernatant collect serum reproductive hormone test .
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion : 1. oocyte equal 20 ; 2. hCG injection serum estradiol level great equal 5000 pmol/L ; 3. day oocyte unilateral bilateral ovarian diameter great equal 10 cm ; 4. follicle puncture large equal number 20 . Exclusion criterion : Allergic letrozole polygeline .
